mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medical_staff (staff_name, position, department, license_no, phone, status, hired_date) VALUES (#{staffName}, #{position}, #{department}, #{licenseNo}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{hiredDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE medical_staff SET staff_name = #{staffName}, position = #{position}, department = #{department}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status}, hired_date = #{hiredDate} WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
